The paragraph does not mention any specific diseases. It is discussing the concept of a founder mutation and its potential impact on carrier frequency in certain ethnic populations in Western Europe.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

The paragraph does not mention any specific diseases. It is discussing the concept of a founder mutation and its potential impact on carrier frequency in certain ethnic populations in Western Europe. Founder mutations are genetic mutations that arise in a small group of ancestors and are then passed down through generations. Carrier frequency refers to the proportion of individuals in a population who carry a particular gene mutation, but do not exhibit symptoms of the disease associated with that mutation. Therefore, the paragraph is not directly discussing diseases, but rather the genetic concepts related to them.
